Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 10 Mahantaraduka » 10.7 Cittasahabhūduka » 10.7.7 Pañhāvāra » 10.7.7.1 Paccayānuloma » 10.7.7.1.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Anantarādi
Mahantaraduka
Cittasahabhūduka
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānuloma
Vibhaṅgavāra
Anantarādi
260.
2959Cittasahabhū dhammo cittasahabhussa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo…  nava (cittasamuṭṭhānadukasadisaṃ, ninnānākaraṇaṃ)…  samanantarapaccayena paccayo…  nava (paṭiccasadisā)…  sahajātapaccayena paccayo…  nava (paṭiccasadisā)…  aññamaññapaccayena paccayo…  nava (paṭiccasadisā)…  nissayapaccayena paccayo…  nava (paccayavārasadisā)…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo…  nava. (Cittasamuṭṭhānadukasadisā.)
<< Adhipatiup Purejāta >>
